heroSubtitle: Shop freely, save big, and never overpay again! We bring you the best deals and special offers from top brands, small shops, and local stores — all in one place just for you.

feature1.title: Exclusive Discount Codes
feature1.description: In Wafr, we provide you with real discount codes directly from stores and partners, so you can enjoy special offers you won’t find anywhere else.

feature2.title: Paid Subscription Guarantees More
feature2.description: The paid subscription guarantees you exclusive, trusted discounts and encourages stores to present their best offers only for Wafr customers.

feature3.title: Discounts at Your Fingertips
feature3.description: All the trusted discount offers are gathered for you in one platform... so you can shop with ease.

feature4.title: Real Partnerships
feature4.description: Partnerships with global and local stores and brands, giving you unique deals that make your shopping experience more enjoyable and unified.

subscriptionPage.title: Wafr Subscription
subscriptionPage.welcomeMessage: Welcome to the Subscription page! Here, you can explore our subscription plans and choose the one that best suits your needs. Enjoy exclusive discounts and offers by subscribing today.
